title: Tassel, 18th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal threads, wooden core
description: Skirt of gilt threads, twisted and looped and each supporting a small tassel. Collar of looped and colored silks. Head is vase-shaped and wrapped with gilt threads. Cord of braided pink, blue, yellow, and gold threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 18th century. Medium: silk, metal threads, wooden core. 1908-2-26.
